TaskItem.Name: ARA Summary Report
TaskItem.EmailBody:
Hello,

 

Pls. find attached ARA summary report for last {0}.

There are 2 tabs - matched and mapped results.

 

{1}

Report type

Count

RLS in $ :

 

 

If you have any question do not hesitate to contact us.

 

Thanks in advance

 

BR,

ARA team
TaskItem.EmailBodyEmpty:
Hello,

 

There were no submissions last {0}.

 

 

If you have any question do not hesitate to contact us.

 

Thanks in advance

 

BR,

ARA team
TaskItem.QueryMappedSummary: select P.[Responsible Entity Name], [Reported_Date],count(*) as [Count], sum(cost_new) as [RLS($)] from v_pyramid p join [dbo].[Account_regions] A on A.[Responsible Entity Name] = P.[Responsible Entity Name] where P.[Reported_Date] >= DATEADD(day, -30, Convert(date, GETDATE())) and A.[Region] = 'EMEA' and matched in (0,2) group by P.[Responsible Entity Name],[Reported_Date] Union select case when P.[Responsible Entity Name] IS NULL then 'UNKNOWN' else P.[Responsible Entity Name] end as [Responsible Entity Name],[Reported_Date],count(*) as [Count], sum(cost_new) as [RLS($)] from v_pyramid p where P.[Reported_Date] >= DATEADD(day, -30, Convert(date, GETDATE())) and P.[Pyramid Region] = 'EMEA' and matched in (0,2) and [Responsible Entity Name] is null group by P.[Responsible Entity Name],[Reported_Date]
TaskItem.QueryMatchedSummary: select P.[Responsible Entity Name], [Reported_Date], count(*) as [Count], sum(cost_new) as [RLS($)] from v_pyramid p join [dbo].[Account_regions] A on A.[Responsible Entity Name] = P.[Responsible Entity Name] where P.[Reported_Date] >= DATEADD(day, -30, Convert(date, GETDATE())) and A.[Region] = 'EMEA' and matched = 1 group by P.[Responsible Entity Name],[Reported_Date] Union select case when P.[Responsible Entity Name] IS NULL then 'UNKNOWN' else P.[Responsible Entity Name] end as [Responsible Entity Name],[Reported_Date],count(*) as [Count],sum(cost_new) as [RLS($)] from v_pyramid p where P.[Reported_Date] >= DATEADD(day, -30, Convert(date, GETDATE())) and P.[Pyramid Region] = 'EMEA' and matched = 1 and [Responsible Entity Name] is null group by P.[Responsible Entity Name],[Reported_Date]
